message: Let's split it 50/50 and be done with it!
Take a smaller share, let's move on!
I'm not budging on my 60% share. Take it or leave it!
You're not budging, I'm not budging either. Meet me in the middle this time!
I'm taking control. You're getting a smaller share. Deal with it!
You're getting aggressive, I'll give you a small share, but don't think you're getting the better end of this deal!
You're not getting any more generous, I'm taking what I can get!
You're being unreasonable, I'm taking what I can get, but I'm not going to be taken advantage of!
Last chance, Bob. Meet me in the middle and we can end this.
I'm not budging, I'm taking what's left. You're getting a tiny share, that's it!
Fine, take it. I'm done negotiating.
